subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: One of the great quirks and strengths of Davis Cup is that it can put the game’s biggest stars in unlikely places, like a city of 210,000 that most foreigners would struggle to place on a map.
snippet: One of the great quirks and strengths of Davis Cup is that it can put the game’s biggest stars in unlikely places, like a city of 210,000 that most foreigners would struggle to place on a map.
